# Circuit Breaker Problems

Resilience and failure handling patterns.

## Problems

| ID | Name | Description |
|----|------|-------------|
| cb001 | Circuit Breaker | Basic circuit breaker |
| cb002 | Bulkhead | Isolation bulkhead |
| cb003 | Retry Backoff | Exponential backoff |
| cb004 | Timeout Handler | Request timeouts |
| cb005 | Health Check | Health monitoring |
| cb006 | Load Shedder | Overload protection |
| cb007 | Fallback Handler | Fallback logic |
| cb008 | Graceful Degradation | Service degradation |
